item.title: Using vRNI with VMC on AWS: Getting Started
item.author: Author
item.description: vRealize Network Insight can be used to gain visibility into the workloads in a VMware Cloud on AWS Software-Defined Data Center (SDDC). Let’s learn how you can get started with using vRealize Network Insight with VMware Cloud on AWS. Demo Product Versions vRNI Cloud VMware Cloud on AWS (SDDC version 1.14v4) Prerequisites VMC on AWS: SDDC deployed Access to the SDDC Process Overview Deploy a vRNI Data Collector in the VMC on AWS SDDC.
